HERO.TITLE: Smart technology for people living with epilepsy
HERO.PARAGRAPH: Comes with a 30-day Free Trial Subscription

HOMEPAGE.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: The Embrace watch uses advanced learning algorithms to identify tonic-clonic seizures and send alerts to caregivers. It also provides sleep, rest, and physical activity analysis
